text: Míriam Tizón Fernández (born 9 March 1991) is an Andorran footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Andorra women's national team. ==Career== Tizón has been capped for the Andorra national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Míriam Tizón
